notes: Spread by Aedes mosquitoes. Very common in India during monsoon.
Common in monsoon; vaccines available in India.
India has one of the worldâ€™s highest TB burdens.
Vaccination and early care reduce severe disease.
Common in rural and tribal belts; Plasmodium falciparum cases can be severe.
